nodes.text: Lake Brell, also known as Brell Lake, was a lake on the ruined world of Taris during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire. The acid lake formed over the ruins of Fellwater Labs, a laboratory that was destroyed in the bombardment of the planet, and its waters were a sickly green color. The biological experiment known as Subject Alpha roamed the lake around 3643 BBY, and a group of Republic colonists built a colony within a bunker on the shore.
